title: Restaurant sign and address type ID.
content:
Hi, replacing some retail signage and I want top match the font of the other shops in the building. Any identification help would really help. Thanks.

Chris

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071712im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cornell_6108.jpg)

Font: 

 Mostra Nuova 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071712/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cornell.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071712/http:/typophile.com/files/Cornell.jpg) | 1.49 MB |
author: cmitch5

comments.content: Should be [Mostra Nuova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071712/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra-nuova) (Alternate C/Three) by Mark Simonson.
